experiences.environment: Worked in a team of 8 working in an agile environment using a mix of Scrum and Kanban methodologies
description: Built a brand new API management platform named TSDL (Target Service Data Layer).
It provides a self-service portal to create, manage, and monitor APIs and includes features like API creation, documentation, compliency testing, and analytics.
It supports OpenAPI, AsyncApi, Protobuff, GraphQL and dataset contracts.
missions: Designed and developed the backend service and the portal.
Created the CI/CD pipeline including quality check and full pyramid testing workflow using ephemeral environments.
Managed release process.
Designed and managed deployment process.
Migrated application from an internal cloud to a public cloud.

missions: Guided teams in adopting containerization standards and best practices.

Documented deployment processes and infrastructure.
Assessed infrastructure cost and efficiency.
